She's unbelievable at this and is always getting praised by the spectators for her work.
${name} throws her bra into the crowd causing an uproar of hooting and screaming. She knows how to drive them crazy. All male members of ${name}'s audience had trouble standing after she finished her set. From start to finish, every move ${name} makes practically sweats sexuality.

She made a few mistakes but overall she is okay at this.
